# actionSheet(_:willDismissWithButtonIndex:)

**Instance Method**

Sent to the delegate before an action sheet is dismissed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func actionSheet(_ actionSheet: UIActionSheet, willDismissWithButtonIndex buttonIndex: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **actionSheet**: The action sheet that is about to be dismissed.
- **buttonIndex**: The index of the button that was clicked. If this is the cancel button index, the action sheet is canceling. If `-1`, the cancel button index is not set.

## Discussion

This method is invoked before the animation begins and the view is hidden.

## Customizing behavior

- **willPresent(_:)**: Sent to the delegate before an action sheet is presented to the user.
- **didPresent(_:)**: Sent to the delegate after an action sheet is presented to the user.
- **actionSheet(_:didDismissWithButtonIndex:)**: Sent to the delegate after an action sheet is dismissed from the screen.
